member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DDisplayV2
member.summary: A WPF version of the Cog3DDisplayV2 VisionPro user control
Cog3DDisplayV2

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2
member.summary: Public interface for the Cog3DDisplayV2 user controls

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.SaveAsImage(System.String)
member.summary: Save the content of the display into an image file with the current resolution of the display. If the filename attribute is not set, the display will show a Save File Dialog to the user so she can specify the name and location of the file to save the image to.
member.param: The name of the file to save the content of the display to.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.SaveAsImage(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Save the content of the scene into an image file with the given width and height as the resolution of the resulting image. If the filename attribute is not set, the display will show a Save File Dialog to the user so she can specify the name and location of the file to save the image to.
member.exception: Throws an ArgumentException if the width is 0 or negative.
Throws an ArgumentException if the height is 0 or negative.
member.param: The width of the resulting image file
The height of the resulting image file
The name of the file to save the content of the display to.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.ResetView
member.summary: Reset the camera's location to its default: 0,0,Z, looking at 0,0,0. Zooms to an extent to fit the graphics into the view.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.FitView
member.summary: Zooms in and out to fit the content of the world into the view

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.SetView(Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DVect3,Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DVect3,Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DVect3)
member.summary: Change the camera's position and look direction in the 3-D space.
member.param: New position of the camera.
New target the camera is looking at.
New up direction of the camera.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.Add(Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase item to the display to the given group. Throws an exception if the item is null. Throws an exception if the item has already been added to the display. Throws an exception if the groupName is null or empty string.
member.exception: Throws an exception if the item is null
Throws an exception if the item has already been added to the display.
Throws an exception if the groupName is null or empty string.
member.param: the Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase item to add to the display
The name of the logical group to add the item to. The groupName is case insensitive.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.GetVisionDataGraphic(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase item at the given index
member.param: the zero based index of the Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase item to return
member.returns: The Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase item at the given index

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.GetVisionDataGraphics
member.summary: Returns all the Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase graphic items added to the display
member.returns: Returns all the Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase graphic items added to the display

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.GetLostAndFoundVisionDataGraphics
member.summary: Returns all the Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase graphic items that has been added to the display but its 3D coordinate space does not hold an entry specified by DisplaySpaceName3D and therefore cannot be rendered
member.returns: Returns all the Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase graphic items that has been added to the display but its 3D coordinate space does not hold an entry specified by DisplaySpaceName3D and therefore cannot be rendered

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.GetVisionDataGraphics(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all the Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase from the given group
member.param: The name of the group to return the Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase from. The groupName is case insensitive.
member.returns: Returns all the Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase from the given group

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.Remove(Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase)
member.summary: Removes the given Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase from the display with all of its associated geometry graphics.
member.exception: Throws an exception if the visionDataGraphic is null.
Throws an exception if the visionDataGraphic is not on the display.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.RemoveVisionDataGraphicByIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the given Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase from the display at the given index. The associated geometry graphics will be removed too.
member.exception: Throws an exception if the index is outside of the graphic collection's boundaries.
member.param: The zero based index of the item to remove

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.Add(Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase,Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the given geometryGraphic to the display. It will be associated with the given VisionDataGraphic and the VisionDataGraphic’s 3D coordinate space tree will be used to resolve the geometry graphic’s SelectedSpaceName3D to the display’s DisplaySpaceName3D. Throws an exception if the geometryGraphic is null. Throws an exception if the geometryGraphic has already been added to the display. Throws an exception if the visionDataGraphic is null. Throws an exception if the visionDataGraphic has NOT yet been added to the display. Throws an exception if the groupName is null or empty string.
member.exception: Throws an exception if the geometryGraphic is null.
Throws an exception if the geometryGraphic has already been added to the display.
Throws an exception if the visionDataGraphic is null.
Throws an exception if the visionDataGraphic has not yet been added to the display.
Throws an exception if the groupName is null or empty string.
member.param: The geometry graphic to add to the display
The vision data graphic to associate the geometry graphic with
The name of the logical group to add the geometry graphic to. The groupName is case insensitive.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.GetGeometryGraphic(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase item at the given index
member.param: the zero based index of the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase item to return
member.returns: The Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase item at the given index

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.GetGeometryGraphics
member.summary: Returns all the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase graphic items added to the display
member.returns: Returns all the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase graphic items added to the display

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.GetLostAndFoundGeometryGraphics
member.summary: Returns all the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase graphic items that has been added to the display but its SelectedSpaceName3D could not be resolved because either: - the SelectedSpaceName3D of the geometry graphic can not be found in the associated VisionData's 3D coordinate space tree - or there is something wrong with the associated VisionData's 3D coordinate space tree and therefore it could not be rendered
member.returns: Returns all the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase graphic items that has been added to the display but its SelectedSpaceName3D could not be resolved

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.GetGeometryGraphics(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase from the given group
member.param: The name of the group to return the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase from. The groupName is case insensitive.
member.returns: Returns all the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase from the given group

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.Remove(Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase)
member.summary: Removes the given Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase from the display
member.exception: Throws an exception if the geometryGraphic is null.
Throws an exception if the geometryGraphic is not on the display.
member.param: The Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase to remove from the display

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.RemoveGeometryGraphicByIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the given Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase from the display at the given index
member.exception: Throws an exception if the index is outside of the graphic collection's boundaries.
member.param: The zero based index of the item to remove

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all the Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase and Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase graphics from the display from the specified group. NOTE: when it removes a Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase all of its associated geometry graphics will be removed regardless of which group they are in.
member.param: The name of the logical group to add the item to. The groupName is case insensitive.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.Clear
member.summary: Cleras the contents of the display

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.BackColor
member.summary: The background color of the display

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.EnableDrawing
member.summary: Gets or sets whether draqing the content of the display is enabled or not. When not enabled, no actual refresh of the display will happen inserting/updating/removing items If adding/updateing/removing multiple items it is advised to disable drawing so no redraw will happen after each individual operation

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.DisplaySpaceName3D
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the coordinate space that needs to be used forrendering RangeImage, PointCloud and any other 3D graphics that is being added to the display NOTE: this is the name of the common shared physical space
member.exception: Throws an CogSpaceTreeInvalidNameSyntaxException if the DisplaySpaceName3D doesn't have a valid space name syntax.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.MouseCoordinatesTracked
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the mouse’s coordinates are tracked in the display. It has to be set to true to figure out the 3D coordinates under the mouse's position. If set to false, mouse coordinates are not tracked and always reported as null.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.MouseCoordinates
member.summary: Returns the 3D coordinates of the mouse pointer. If there is no valid 3D coordinates of the mouse it returns null. The MouseCoordinatesTracked property has to be set to true otherwise mouse coordinates are not tracked at all and will always return null.

member.name: E:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.MouseCoordinatesChanged
member.summary: Event to signal the change of MouseCoordinates

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.CameraPosition
member.summary: Returns the camera's position in the world space

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.CameraTarget
member.summary: Returns the camera's target position (look at) in the world space

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.CameraUpDirection
member.summary: Returns the camera's up direction in the world space

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.VisionDataGraphicsCount
member.summary: Return the number of Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase items in the display

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.GeometryGraphicsCount
member.summary: Return the number of Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase items in the display

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.DisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the current rendering mode of the display NOTE: Setting the mode to DisplayModes.Vertices may lead to runtime error on Intel HD3000 with the latest Intel grpahics driver (VC5 hardware)

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.AutoResolution
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the display should automatically figure out the subsampling rate for the Cog3DVisionDataGraphic objects

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DDisplayV2.Resolution
member.summary: Gets or sets the subsampling rate in DisplaySpaceName3D units. To make the display use this given value set AutoResolution to false

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DDisplayV2StatusBar.Destroy
member.summary: Use this function to explicitly clean up the control. Call this only from the thread the control was created on, if the method is called from any other thread it does nothing. You may call this function multiple times without any ill effects but only the first call - from the appropriate thread - has effect.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DDisplay.SamplingRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the sampling rate of the model. The higher this value is, the lower the rendering quality will be. For auto-sampling, use 0.
member.exception: Thrown when the given value is smaller than 0.
